metadata.title: Getting Started with Company SDK API

steps.title: Install the SDK
steps.description: Install the company SDK using npm package manager.

steps.title: Import the Client
steps.description: Import the Client class from the installed SDK into your JavaScript file.

steps.title: Create Client Instance
steps.description: Initialize a new client instance with your API key from environment variables.
steps.notes: You can get your API key from the dashboard

steps.title: Make Your First API Request
steps.description: Use the client to fetch a list of users and log the response data.

code.content:
const response = await client.users.list({ limit: 10 })
console.log(response.data)

steps.notes: This completes your first API call using the SDK
